body.name: VESAUR Upgrade 9" Lighted Makeup Mirror, Rechargeable 1x/10x HD Undistorted Magnifying Mirror with 3 Colors, Brightness Adjustable, 360° Rotation Detachable Base Vanity Mirror, Senior Gold (Gift)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 28 mins
features: 🔎 🎅【𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐨𝐫 9-𝐢𝐧𝐜𝐡 𝐎𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 𝐌𝐢𝐫𝐫𝐨𝐫 & 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐮𝐦 𝐏𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐥 𝐍𝐢𝐜𝐤𝐞𝐥】①16 inch high, 9 inch oversized, the upgraded size of makeup mirror with lights makes you no longer have the worry of bending over to do your makeup, provides a larger and HD wider angle view.②Made of gorgeous superior Pearl Nickel, chemically stable with strong anti-corrosion properties.Comfortable lubrication just as touch the pearl .It can be an Christmas gift for women.③Unlike traditional lighted makeup mirrors, our magnifying mirror with light is made of a rare one-piece crystal glass mirror, which is resistant to blows and reflects no unnecessary light, easily illuminating your beauty

🎄🔋 【4000 𝐦𝐀𝐇 𝐑𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐌𝐢𝐫𝐫𝐨𝐫 & 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫 𝐒𝐚𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞】①Build in 4000mAH batteries.lighted makeup mirror with magnification can be charged through USB by powerbank, PC, etc.No need to charge frequently anymore, very convenient to take everywhere. (Charging cable included, charger not) The red light next to the USB port is on when charging,and it goes out when it is fully charged The battery in the mirror does not need to be replaced②makeup mirrors that light up and magnified have amazing Intelligent 1-hour automatic shutdown function, even if you are in a hurry to go out, you do not have to worry about electricity

🎄💗【1X/10X 𝐃𝐨𝐮𝐛𝐥𝐞-𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐠𝐧𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧& 360° 𝐒𝐦𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐡 𝐑𝐨𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】①1X/10X magnification, classic dual-sided design makes this lighted magnifying mirror much more easier to get a flawless makeup look. the 1X mirror reflects your overall makeup, and the 10X HD undisputed magnification on the other hand shows details of your face(eyeliner, mascara, eyebrows, contact lens, etc.)② After 10,000 times professional smooth test, the mirror with light can be rotated 360° freely without causing any damage to the vanity mirror with lights,and switch between 1x and 10x mirrors, giving you the perfect reflection

💝🎀【3 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐫 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 & 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 & 1𝐇 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨 𝐒𝐡𝐮𝐭𝐝𝐨𝐰𝐧】①The rechargeable makeup mirror is built-in with 60 eye-care grade LED lights with CRI>97, providing a soft and stable light source. Maintaining your makeup is our pursuit! lighted magnifying mirror has 3 color light: Short press the sensor switch to change the color of the light（Cold light, warm light, natural light, long press adjusts the brightness (100-1200LUX )of the light②Unlike traditional mirror with lights and magnification, our personal makeup mirrors have one-hour auto-off function, you don’t need to worry about unnecessary charges caused by forgetting to turn off the power

🎅🌞【 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐁𝐚𝐬𝐞 & 𝐄𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐍𝐨𝐧-𝐬𝐥𝐢𝐩 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧】①The base of the makeup mirror with light adopts high-tech change magnetic suction technology, the base suction is strong, the base and the lighted vanity mirror can be instantly disassembled. Easy to install,It is the best makeup companion for your traveling.②In addition, the magnifying makeup mirror base is designed with non-slip pads, which improves the stability of the mirror, protects your home and ensures that the mirror won't move around when you are putting on makeup

💎💌【𝐕𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐞’𝐬 𝐃𝐚𝐲 𝐆𝐢𝐟𝐭 & 100% 𝐒𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐆𝐮𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐞】①Our VESAUR LED Illuminated Makeup Mirrors are securely packaged in 3 thick packaging materials and rigorously drop-tested from a height of 150 centimeters to ensure that the makeup mirror large with lights are safe on the way to delivery.②The exquisite packaging makes the lighted magnifying makeup mirror a perfect gift for Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas and other festivals. We have a strict quality control system. And with 12h online customer support, VESAUR Makeup Mirror with Lighting will be your lifetime beauty companion

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VESUAR 9-inch Large Rechargeable 1X/10X Magnifying Lighted Makeup Mirror（Gold） Upgraded Removable Vesaur Lighted Makeup Mirror, 9inch super size, bring you a new visual experience, three adjustable light modes, suitable for all kinds of light, easy to create a flawless makeup look.1X/10X Magnifying mirror the actual effect of makeup.

Rechargeable Lighted Makeup Mirror with Light,for Your Beauty Protection The USB rechargeable design means you don't need to replace the disposable battery, boasts an impressive built-in battery with a capacity of 4000mAh. which can continuously work for 3-10 hours after fully charging( USB cable included in the package, USB charger not included ).

Super Bright LED Makeup Mirror with Lights, 3 Adjustable Light Modes Built-in 60 professional-grade LED lights provide ultra-bright and soft light source for eye protection. LED lights are durable, consume less energy and are more friendly.3 lighting modes can meet your different makeup needs for different occasions. You can apply makeup in any lighting situation

Lighted Makeup Mirrors with Powerful 10X HD magnification True high-definition imaging, mirror reflection gives you a more detailed imaging. 1X ordinary side is designed for overall look. 10X magnifying mirror is clearly to see your facial features. Not only for makeup, but also for face details like wearing contact lenses, trimming

9INCH LARGE Revolutionary Vanity Mirror, Exquisite and Attentive Details After many R&D upgrades, the 9 inch large lighted vanity mirror is made of professional-grade pearl nickel, 60 eye-protecting LED lights and one-piece seamless crystal mirror with portable and removable base, which combines practicality and aesthetics, modernity and retroism in one.

Portable Traveling Makeup Mirror, Your Vintage Luxury Home Decorations This magnifying mirror with light is removable. The base of the vanity mirror has a magnetic design that allows for immediate removal and installation, The exterior is made of premium vintage pearl nickel, a great decorative piece to bring a vintage luxury feeling to your home!

Exquisite packaging,The perfect Gift Choice for Christmas Day As beautiful as it is functional, this vanity mirror has a frame, column and base made of brushed pearl nickel. It comes in three thick layers of packaging that are both sturdy and delicate. It's the perfect gift for her. Christmas is coming , Our cosmetic mirrors are also a great choice as a gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made great lighting
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is a beautiful addition to my vanity, it is well made, well lit and fits in beautifully with the decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great option for smaller makeup mirror
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a large Vesaur magnified mirror daily for 18 months and continue to be pleased with every aspect. I bought the smaller version for travel and use in other areas of the house. It is bright and just as clear as the large mirror. I would recommend this to anyone needing a smaller magnified makeup mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great magnifying no distortion
reviews.reviewText: So far I LOVE this mirror, it’s a keeper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what she wanted. So far she has no issues with the mirror. The light works great and it’s big enough. Keep in mind for the 10X part you do have to be close for it to work properly. The price is not bad for the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything You Could Ever Want In A Makeup Mirror!
reviews.reviewText: I am blown away by this mirror! It truly is everything I could want in a makeup mirror.The mirror is wonderfully large so you can see everything. The lighting is amazing. Lights are very bright and even. All three lighting settings are very useful and is a great feature for all different types of makeup application and needs. It also came with a round 10x magnifying mirror with suction cups to place right on the large makeup mirror. With the magnifier I am able to do detailed work including eyebrows and applying false eyelashes.It has a pretty brushed silver finish. The base of it is a tray design, which is convenient. It looks so beautiful on my makeup table. Very glamourous! It also shipped very fast!I absolutely love this mirror! It really is very Hollywood!I would recommend this VESAUR Hollywood Lighted Makeup Mirror.It is truly a mirror you can see models and actors using in Hollywood, and now I have one in my own home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VeryLarge mirror, three bountiful light settings
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a lighted makeup mirror with a very large mirror, full facial view and three perfect light settings—-daylight light, candle light and bright office light—this is the mirror! This “Hollywood” style mirror is very large with bulbs all around it for the perfect view and light setting for whatever make up look you want or need! Has a strong steady base to support it and swivel feature which provides a view perfect from every angle as well.Manufacturer offers a free mini mirror to boot and warranty for free replacement mirror if damaged.Love this mirror!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2019
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is beautiful you can tilt it to any angle you like. It also has 3 lighting settings and brightness adjustment. I love it. The first one I received actually only turned on for a second and then completely turned off and never turned back on. I dropped it off to be returned and in just 2 days I got a new one. Great experience overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Lighted Mirror for Flawless Makeup
reviews.reviewText: This lighted mirror went above my expectations. The delivery was super fast, packaging was perfect, and the lighted mirror worked like a charm. The 3 different light settings with the dimmer option are perfect for makeup application. The size of the mirror is perfect as well, not too big, not to small. It is refreshing to order something online and it is better than advertised.
